name: AxisPropertiesGaugeOptions

properties.name: axisLabelColor
properties.description: Color of the axis labels (used only in the custom preset)
properties.rawdescription: Color of the axis labels (used only in the custom preset)

properties.name: axisLabelDistance
properties.description: Distance of the axis labels from the center
properties.rawdescription: Distance of the axis labels from the center

properties.name: axisLabelDistanceRatio
properties.description: Distance of the axis labels from the center as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides axisLabelDistance)
properties.rawdescription: Distance of the axis labels from the center as a ratio relative to the axisLineWidth (overrides axisLabelDistance)

properties.name: axisLabelFontSize
properties.rawdescription: Font size of the axis labels

properties.name: axisLabelFontSizeMax
properties.description: Maximum font size of the axis labels (used for clamping)
properties.rawdescription: Maximum font size of the axis labels (used for clamping)

properties.name: axisLabelFontSizeMin
properties.description: Minimum font size of the axis labels (used for clamping)
properties.rawdescription: Minimum font size of the axis labels (used for clamping)

properties.name: axisLabelFontSizeRatio
properties.description: Font size of the axis labels as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides axisLabelFontSize)
properties.rawdescription: Font size of the axis labels as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides axisLabelFontSize)

properties.name: axisLineWidthRatio
properties.description: Width of the axis line as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides axisLineWidth)
properties.rawdescription: Width of the axis line as a ratio relative to the container size (overrides axisLineWidth)

description: Properties related to the axis of the gauge
rawdescription: Properties related to the axis of the gauge
